keyword: how many calories in tootsie pop
title: How Many Calories in a Tootsie Pop?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in tootsie pop, including carbs, sugars, and other nutrients per pop, with quick tweaks and FAQs for candy lovers.
h1: How Many Calories in a Tootsie Pop?
assumptions: Standard Tootsie Pop (cherry or similar flavor), ~17 g total weight, including hard candy shell and chewy Tootsie Roll center; no wrappers or variations.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by flavor, batch, and manufacturer; check packaging for exact values as formulations can change.

quick_answer.text: One Tootsie Pop has about 60 kcal, mostly from sugars.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Add sprinkles or dip in chocolate

faqs.q: How many calories in one Tootsie Pop?
faqs.a: Approximately 60 kcal per standard Tootsie Pop.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in a Tootsie Pop?
faqs.a: About 14 g carbs, with 10 g sugars and 0 g fiber.

faqs.q: Does a Tootsie Pop have any protein or fat?
faqs.a: No significant protein or fatâ€”0 g each.

faqs.q: How does flavor affect calories in Tootsie Pops?
faqs.a: Most flavors are similar at ~60 kcal, but check labels for variations.
Yes, only about 10 mg sodium per pop.
